data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3305627,"name":"FredK","username":"FredK","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/f/71e660/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-09T16:28:25.614Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eIf the robot is using something to autoalign with an object (like the speaker) and the driver is driving (to avoid defense for example) will they be fighting against each other if used at the same time? Do you give one priority? Can you use autoalign and manually drive at the same time? Hope this question makes sense.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2024-02-09T16:28:25.614Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":225,"readers_count":224,"score":105.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":454036,"topic_slug":"conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign","display_username":"FredK","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31768,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign/454036/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3305661,"name":"vargoose84","username":"vargoose84","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/vargoose84/{size}/165453_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-09T16:47:18.069Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eAt 3630, we use command based programming, and as a result our commands would not fight each other.  In this scenario, we would have a button on our controller dedicated to auto-align driving (which would only control the rotation of the robot).  If the driver deems it necessary to avoid defense, we would just let go of the auto-align button and re-engage it when necessary.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2024-02-09T16:47:18.069Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":207,"readers_count":206,"score":136.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":454036,"topic_slug":"conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign","display_username":"vargoose84","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":30247,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3630 Assistant Coach - Stampede Robotics"},"post_url":"/t/conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign/454036/2","custom_user_title":"3630 Assistant Coach - Stampede Robotics","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3305943,"name":"Ibrahim Ahmad","username":"BoiledBurntBagel","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/boiledburntbagel/{size}/223392_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-09T21:03:36.138Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eYou could also have the driver input “override” the autoalign input. If your joystick input is non zero you use the joystick input.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2024-02-09T21:03:36.138Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":158,"readers_count":157,"score":31.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":454036,"topic_slug":"conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign","display_username":"Ibrahim Ahmad","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53576,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"CAN't Bus"},"post_url":"/t/conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign/454036/3","custom_user_title":"CAN't Bus","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3305947,"name":"viggy96","username":"viggy96","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/viggy96/{size}/252784_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-09T21:09:19.288Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWhat kind of drivetrain are you using?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf you’re using swerve (or some other omnidirectional drivetrain type), you can continue to take input from the driver for strafing in your auto-align command (to translate the robot), but have the auto align only take over the rotation. So the driver can continue to drive around and avoid things, but the command is controlling the robot’s rotation and keeps it aimed at the desired target.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2024-02-09T21:09:19.288Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":144,"readers_count":143,"score":78.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":454036,"topic_slug":"conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign","display_username":"viggy96","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24613,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"418 Mentor | Tries to be smart"},"post_url":"/t/conceptual-question-about-manually-driving-while-using-autoalign/454036/4","custom_user_title":"418 Mentor | Tries to be smart","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3306011,"name":"Kyle Reeve","username":"kreeve","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kreeve/{size}/187015_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-09T22:31:00.102Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003e+1, also useful to make your driver have to take their thumb away from the turning joystick in order to press the auto align button.
